name: part_008
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live ＂STELLAR into the GALAXY＂ Supported By Bushiroad [LtqzI9y5yII]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Transition between songs with instrumental music and visual effects.
MC section after the song performance, talking about the cold weather.

subtitles.original: ...なんページ目だったっけ
subtitles.english: ...What page was it on again?

subtitles.original: 今君に会いたいと
subtitles.english: Now, wanting to see you

subtitles.original: 涙こらえて
subtitles.english: Holding back my tears

subtitles.original: さよならだ さよならなんだって 認めたくないけど
subtitles.english: It's goodbye, even if I don't want to admit it's goodbye

subtitles.original: 雨上がりの この世界が 眩しいから
subtitles.english: Because this world after the rain is so dazzling

subtitles.original: もう帰れない 振り返らない 思い出と共に
subtitles.english: I can't go back anymore, I won't look back, together with my memories

subtitles.original: 新しい風にあおられ
subtitles.english: Buffeted by a new wind

subtitles.original: そしてまた 君に会いたいと願い 駆けていく
subtitles.english: And so again, wishing to see you, I run on

subtitles.original: 駆けていく
subtitles.english: I run on

subtitles.original: 葛藤のサイレン 乾いた戦場
subtitles.english: The siren of conflict, a parched battlefield

subtitles.original: 生け捕りつけた 引き分けは3.2リッター
subtitles.english: A captured draw, 3.2 liters

subtitles.original: どんな言葉にもちゃんと ほころびがあった
subtitles.english: Every word had its cracks

subtitles.original: もう何も言わずに遊ぼう
subtitles.english: Let's just play without saying anything more

subtitles.original: どうでもいい朝に 誰一人聞いて
subtitles.english: On a trivial morning, with no one listening

subtitles.original: 傘は持ってない 借りてた未来
subtitles.english: I don't have an umbrella, a borrowed future

subtitles.original: 貸し借し欠かし空から 街ゆく余所者の
subtitles.english: Lending, borrowing, lacking, from the sky, a stranger in the city

subtitles.original: ねぇねぇ一人だ 片手離したのはベイビー レイニー
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, I'm alone, the one who let go of your hand was baby, Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー 君は隣にいないんだね
subtitles.english: Rainy, you're not by my side, are you?

subtitles.original: 悲しくはないよ 嬉しくもないよベイビー レイニー
subtitles.english: I'm not sad, but I'm not happy either, baby, Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー 欲を言えば隣に
subtitles.english: Rainy, if I were to ask for more, by my side

subtitles.original: 現世式の塗装を 染めるレイニー レイニー
subtitles.english: Staining the mundane paint, Rainy, Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー この街を変えたんだね
subtitles.english: Rainy, you changed this town, didn't you?

subtitles.original: レプリカステップ パノラマ レイニー レイニー
subtitles.english: Replica step, panorama, Rainy, Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー 君はなんて言ったの
subtitles.english: Rainy, what did you say?

subtitles.original: バイバイ バイバイ 欲を言えば隣に 証拠
subtitles.english: Bye-bye, bye-bye, if I were to ask for more, by my side, evidence

subtitles.original: 臭いのアトラクション あやってワンウェイテール
subtitles.english: A smelly attraction, manipulated one-way tail

subtitles.original: 光あたれば それでよかった
subtitles.english: If the light shone, that was enough

subtitles.original: 会えないと 会えないと 泣いた後の事
subtitles.english: The things after crying because we can't meet, we can't meet

subtitles.original: 再生のよは 混ざりたくないな
subtitles.english: I don't want to mix with the world of rebirth

subtitles.original: 幻想 5分の
subtitles.english: Fantasy, five minutes

subtitles.original: 砂地声 宇宙の裏
subtitles.english: A sandy voice, the back of the universe

subtitles.original: 白い煙に吹かれながら歌う
subtitles.english: Singing while being blown by white smoke

subtitles.original: 救いもない 四迷琴
subtitles.english: No salvation, a world of confusion

subtitles.original: ねぇねぇ一人だ こぼしたのはベイビー レイニー
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, I'm alone, the one who spilled it was baby, Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー 空を見たいだけ
subtitles.english: Rainy, I just want to see the sky

subtitles.original: 確かな声に 似ているアリバイ バイバイ バイバイ
subtitles.english: An alibi that resembles a certain voice, bye-bye, bye-bye

subtitles.original: バイバイ しなくちゃいけないんだ
subtitles.english: Bye-bye, I have to do it

subtitles.original: 歩道のかすも ありのなりなり
subtitles.english: Even the dregs of the sidewalk, as they are

subtitles.original: 君も行くなら 虹を祈ってる
subtitles.english: If you're going too, I'll pray for a rainbow

subtitles.original: ねぇねぇ一人だ 片手離したのはベイビー レイニー
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, I'm alone, the one who let go of your hand was baby, Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー 君は隣にいないんだね
subtitles.english: Rainy, you're not by my side, are you?

subtitles.original: 悲しくはないよ 嬉しくもないよベイビー レイニー
subtitles.english: I'm not sad, but I'm not happy either, baby, Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー 欲を言えば隣に
subtitles.english: Rainy, if I were to ask for more, by my side

subtitles.original: 現世式の塗装を 埋めるレイニー レイニー
subtitles.english: Filling in the mundane paint, Rainy, Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー 触れたかったんだよね
subtitles.english: Rainy, I wanted to touch you, didn't I?

subtitles.original: レプリカステップ パノラマ レイニー レイニー
subtitles.english: Replica step, panorama, Rainy, Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー 君を待っていたよ
subtitles.english: Rainy, I was waiting for you

subtitles.original: バイバイ バイバイ 欲を言えば隣で バイバイ
subtitles.english: Bye-bye, bye-bye, if I were to ask for more, by my side, bye-bye

subtitles.original: はい、ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Yes, thank you very much!

subtitles.original: ふー、まずはね、3曲歌わせていただきました！
subtitles.english: Whew, first, I sang three songs!

subtitles.original: ふー、いや、今日めっちゃ寒くてさ、
subtitles.english: Whew, man, it's really cold today,

subtitles.original: なんか、寒すぎて舞台袖にいる時から、
subtitles.english: It was so cold that even while I was in the wings,

subtitles.original: 寒い寒い寒い！って。
subtitles.english: I was like, "It's cold, it's cold, it's cold!"
